summary: After Enisa vanished, someone had to fill in her shoes.
descriptionHtml:
I took a very long break from Skyrim and as soon as I got back all my mods were outdated. After getting them up to speed I lost [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Enisa[/url] - upon load her looks were all messed up. So I tried to recreate her, with very limited success. Here is the result, as a CharGen preset.

 -- REQUIRED --
Extenders:
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?]ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/?]CharGen Extension[/url]﻿

Looks:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii SkyHair[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows HD
[/url]**UPDATE** - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1167/?]Pretty Lips[/url] also required

Anne comes with 2 variants of vanilla eyes, but for tweaking you might want to try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]﻿.



 -- OPTIONAL --

Outfits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53518/?]Fluffy Travel Attire[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36459/?]Ghorza's Armor[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52667/?]Hedge Mage Armor[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url]﻿

Urban outfits, not lore friendly:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55611/?]Gim Boots[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53864/?]Sexy Vests[/url]


Weapons:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28545/?]Ghosus Weapons Pack[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5727/?]Isilmeriel LOTR weapon collection[/url]﻿



 -- INSTRUCTIONS --

After downloading and installing all mods mentioned above OPTIONAL, follow these steps:

1. Download this mod and place it in "data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets"
2. Open Skyrim using SKSE
3. Load any working save file
4. Open the console
5. Type showracemenu
6. Select the Imperial Race
7. Look for the slide option "preset slot"
8. Select either slot 3 (brown eyes) or 4 (blue eyes, left eye blind) and press F9, this should load Anne's face.
9. Customize, tweak, mess up as you please




 -- CREDITS -- 

All credits go to the mod authors.



 -- PERMISSIONS -- 

Do as you please.
author: mounted
